name: pbmtoicon
description:
pbmtoicon -
convert a portable bitmap into a Sun icon
body:
pbmtoicon

NAME

pbmtoicon - convert a portable bitmap into a Sun icon

SYNOPSIS

pbmtoicon [pbmfile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads a portable bitmap as input. Produces a Sun icon as output.

SEE ALSO

icontopbm(1), pbm(5)
